name: InadequateHousingScreeningAssessmentsAndQuestions
title: Inadequate Housing Screening Assessments And Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessments and questions for Inadequate Housing as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessments or questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses  for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessments and questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)
